about_the_game:
About the Demo:

Dive into the Ayasa: Shadows of Silence demo as an introductory tutorial that sets the stage for the full game. This demo, covering the first level of the six included in the full release, serves as a comprehensive introduction to the gameplay mechanics, characters, and the atmospheric world of Ayasa. It’s designed to guide new players on what to expect throughout their journey.

Gameplay Highlights:

  • Tutorial-like Experience: The demo acts as a tutorial, familiarizing you with the core gameplay elements and strategies you’ll need in the full game.

  • Introduction to the Game World: Get your first glimpse into the unique characters and immersive atmosphere of Ayasa’s universe.

  • Easter Egg Storyline: Discover hidden elements that hint at a deeper, easter egg-laden narrative—vital for those aiming to achieve the true ending in the full game.

  • Focus on Basics: While the demo excludes the complete plot and special powers found in the full game, it lays the foundational skills and understanding necessary for the challenges ahead.

Sneak Peek into the Full Game:

The full version of Ayasa: Shadows of Silence builds significantly on what you’ll experience in the demo, introducing more levels, enhanced gameplay features, and a deeper exploration of the plot and special abilities. Expect a richer, more engaging adventure as you delve further into the game’s mysteries and work towards unlocking the true ending.

Art Direction

Step into a magical realm where every visual detail enchants. Influenced by Tim Burton and René Laloux, our art direction blends dark fantasy with a minimalist color palette to evoke both terror and wonder. Our levels, alive and surreal, are more than mere settings; they are vibrant characters that tell tales of awe, fear, and reflection.

Welcome to a universe where each lit screen opens a portal to a surreal, noir fantasy world. Explore symbolic lands that transform every moment into a profound visual and emotional experience.
